<center>

A variety of data sources are used in the creation of the FloStrength variables, dataframes, and predictions. These websites and databases that were used typically have a larger extent of data and up-to-the-minute reports and scores available as well. 

[Sports Reference](https://www.sports-reference.com)

Used to gather historical data and current data to create personal variables

[ESPN](https://www.espn.com)

Used to get sports results and games being played 


[CBS Sports](https://www.cbssports.com)

Used to get sports results and games being played 

[SportsLine](https://seanfloersch.shinyapps.io/FloStrengthHistory/)

Used to get book odds that are used in modelling and bets

[Massey Ratings](https://seanfloersch.shinyapps.io/FloStrengthHistory/)

Used to get conference ratings for college sports
